channel.title: [508] 3 Problems I Need to Fix [508]
channel.description:
1. My Noted items dont work, they stay noted even after i put them in the bank and all, they dont even come out as notes when i do the "Withdraw Noted" bank option... or whatever its called... Anyone who knows how to fix that please post! :D
-----------------------
2. How do i make it so that i can sell any item to shops, like making it a general store, because right now my shops can only sell, If you could, please include Buying options, my only say "value, buy, examine".
-----------------------
3. Problem with trading options, I followed gravediggah's tutorial on full trading completely, and i can't trade by like "offer 10, offer 5, offer x, offer all" does not work.... i need to know how to make it so those things work..
Edit: Forgot a Problem!

item.title: [508] 3 Problems I Need to Fix [508]
item.dc:creator: @ThatCrackerZach ThatCrackerZach
item.description:
@ThatCrackerZach wrote:

  1. My Noted items dont work, they stay noted even after i put them in
    the bank and all, they dont even come out as notes when i do the
    “Withdraw Noted” bank option… or whatever its called… Anyone who knows
    how to fix that please post!
  1. How do i make it so that i can sell any item to shops, like making it a general store,
    because right now my shops can only sell, If you could, please include Buying
    options, my only say “value, buy, examine”.
  1. Problem with trading options, I followed gravediggah’s tutorial on full trading completely,
    and i can’t trade by like “offer 10, offer 5, offer x, offer all” does not work…
    i need to know how to make it so those things work…
